subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: [RTSC] Is random as good/better?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
The Sony Headphone, the same one from 2009, the one that says ".......earth
is doomed" at the end. It's also the only Sony headphone radio I've ever
found.  I don't know why, but after that I couldn't get it to sweep, and now
it works.

 These things almost seem to have a mind of their own, I was having trouble
with the sound distortion in 86 and thought it was a bad tuner so I replaced
it. I needed a part and was going to rob it off the tuner from 86, and I
could not hold on to that board, it seemed to almost jump out of my hand. I
got the message and reused that tuner in 86, and it turned out to be a power
problem, not the tuner.

 F-S
